name: IntranasalCorticosteroids
title: Intranasal Corticosteroids
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set encodes a Action defining the concept intranasal steroids for the AAO-HNSF guideline on Allergic Rhinitis),(Data Element Scope: This value set is intended to work with the data element type, Medication),(Inclusion Criteria: Search terms included: ^intranasal azelastine fluticasone beclomethasone budesonide ciclesonide flunisolide mometasone triamcinolone dymista qnasl beconase thinocort zetonna omnaris veramyst nasonex Flonase allernaze "aller-flo" astelin clarispray nasarel "tri-nasal" vancenase -topical -cream -oral -tablet -inhalant -enema -injectable -ophthalmic -suppository -paste -inhaler -syringe -injection -otic -implant -rectal -),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
